The most horrifyingly sad thing about this "bleached" version is the amount of favorites it has completely pales in comparison to the amount the original has. The original has close to 22,000 favorites, while this one's only around 2,800. I mean, it'd be just as horrifyingly sad if this version got more favorites than the original. But this right here goes to show that, while 2,800 people's a lot of people, the bulk of this website's users don't agree with this "bleaching" shit.
